verses.verse: The <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H3789>written<s%> with a <S%H5842>pen<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and with the <S%H6856>point<s%> of a <S%H8068>diamond:<s%> it is <S%H2790>graven<s%> on the <S%H3871>table<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of your <S%H4196>altars;<s%>

Whilst their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%> and their <S%H842>groves<s%> by the <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> on the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H1389>hills.<s%>

O my <S%H2042>mountain<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H2428>substance<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H214>treasures<s%> to the <S%H957>spoil,<s%> and your <S%H1116>high<s%> places for <S%H2403>sin,<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

And you, even yourself, shall <S%H8058>discontinue<s%> from your <S%H5159>heritage<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you; and I will cause you to <S%H5647>serve<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> not: for you have <S%H6919>kindled<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> which shall <S%H3344>burn<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H982>trusts<s%> in <S%H120>man,<s%> and makes <S%H1320>flesh<s%> his <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5493>departs<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For he shall be like the <S%H6176>heath<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert,<s%> and shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H935>comes;<s%> but shall <S%H7931>inhabit<s%> the <S%H2788>parched<s%> places in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in a <S%H4420>salt<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> and not <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H982>trusts<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and whose <S%H4009>hope<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is.

For he shall be as a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H8362>planted<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and that <S%H7971>spreads<s%> out her <S%H8328>roots<s%> by the <S%H3105>river,<s%> and shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H2527>heat<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> but her <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall be <S%H7488>green;<s%> and shall not be <S%H1672>careful<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1226>drought,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H4185>cease<s%> from <S%H6213>yielding<s%> <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H6121>deceitful<s%> above <S%H3605>all<s%> things, and <S%H605>desperately<s%> <S%H605>wicked:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H3045>know<s%> it?

I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2713>search<s%> the <S%H3820>heart,<s%> I <S%H974>try<s%> the <S%H3629>reins,<s%> even to <S%H5414>give<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

As the <S%H7124>partridge<s%> <S%H1716>sits<s%> on <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> and <S%H3205>hatches<s%> them not; so he that <S%H6213>gets<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and not by <S%H4941>right,<s%> shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them in the <S%H2677>middle<s%> of his <S%H3117>days,<s%> and at his <S%H319>end<s%> shall be a <S%H5036>fool.<s%>
A <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> from the <S%H7223>beginning<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of our <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H4723>hope<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> you shall be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> and they that <S%H3249>depart<s%> from me shall be <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
<S%H7495>Heal<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and I shall be <S%H7495>healed;<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me, and I shall be <S%H3467>saved:<s%> for you are my <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H346>Where<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> let it <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H4994>now.<s%>

As for me, I have not <S%H213>hastened<s%> from being a <S%H7462>pastor<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> you: <S%H3808>neither<s%> have I <S%H183>desired<s%> the <S%H605>woeful<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> you <S%H3045>know:<s%> that which <S%H4161>came<s%> out of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> was <S%H5227>right<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.
Be not a <S%H4288>terror<s%> to me: you are my <S%H4268>hope<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Let them be <S%H954>confounded<s%> that <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me, but let not me be <S%H954>confounded:<s%> let them be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> but let not me be <S%H2865>dismayed:<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> on them the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H7665>destroy<s%> them with <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H7670>destruction.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to me; <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> in, and by the <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3318>go<s%> out, and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that <S%H935>enter<s%> in by <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8179>gates:<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H5315>yourselves,<s%> and <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> nor <S%H935>bring<s%> it in by the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H4853>burden<s%> out of your <S%H1004>houses<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> you <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> but <S%H6942>hallow<s%> you the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

But they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> their <S%H241>ear,<s%> but made their <S%H6202>neck<s%> <S%H7185>stiff,<s%> that they might not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H1115>nor<s%> <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H518>if<s%> you diligently <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> in <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> through the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> but <S%H6942>hallow<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein;

Then shall there <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> they, and their <S%H8269>princes,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and from the <S%H5439>places<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and from the <S%H8219>plain,<s%> and from the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and from the <S%H5045>south,<s%> <S%H935>bringing<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, and <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and meat <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> and <S%H3828>incense,<s%> and <S%H935>bringing<s%> sacrifices of <S%H8426>praise,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me to <S%H6942>hallow<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and not to <S%H5375>bear<s%> a <S%H4853>burden,<s%> even <S%H935>entering<s%> in at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> then will I <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>
